## *Wonder Woman*

The `wonder-woman` directory contains data and notebooks for reproducing and building on the analysis in my 2018 paper using character networks to explore 
the gendered dynamics in *Wonder Woman*.

| --- | --- |
| `01-WW-paper.Rmd` | `01-WW-paper.nb.html` |
